title: Build a system health check script
description: Build a system health check script — checks disk space, memory, log sizes, running launchd jobs, and reports issues. Should be runnable on-demand and optionally scheduled weekly.

actions.note: Nightly self-assigned todo. System maintenance is part of BMO's responsibilities but no health check tooling exists yet.

Built scripts/health-check.sh — checks disk, memory, logs, 7 launchd jobs, 4 key processes, network (Telegram API + gateway), and 6 state files. Supports --quiet and --json modes. Scheduled weekly via com.bmo.health-check launchd job (Mondays 8am).
